text: Epic TV is an Indian television channel. It airs both fiction and non-fiction programs in many different genres. These include action, drama, comedy and narrative. Its programming is focused on Indian history, folklore and mythology. Epic TV began broadcasting on 19 November 2014. it airs programs in Hindi. Some of its programs have been added to Netflix. These programs include Raja Rasoi Aur Anya Kahaniyaan,Kahi Suni,Dharmakshetra and Sanrachana. They have been popular with the Indian people living outsde of India. ==Programming== * ==References== Category:Television channels in India
title: Epic TV
